photographers.name: Ravi Studio
photographers.bio: Hey there! I'm Ravi and I've been doing photography for about 8 years now. Started with my dad's old camera and here we are! Love capturing those special moments.

reviews.name: Ananya
reviews.comment: Ravi was amazing! He made us feel so comfortable and the photos turned out better than we expected. Definitely booking again!

reviews.name: Karthik
reviews.comment: Good work, though he was running a bit late. But the final photos were worth the wait!

photographers.name: Lens Queen Photography
photographers.bio: Hi! I'm Priyanka, the 'Lens Queen' :) Been shooting for 5+ years, specializing in kids and family portraits. Your little ones are safe with me!

reviews.name: Priya
reviews.comment: She's really good with kids! My 2-year-old was being cranky but she handled it like a pro.

photographers.name: Click Factory
photographers.bio: We're a team of 3 photographers who love what we do. Been in the wedding game for 6 years. We travel anywhere in Maharashtra!

reviews.name: Rahul & Sneha
reviews.comment: These guys are AMAZING! They captured every emotion of our wedding day. Money well spent!

reviews.name: Amit
reviews.comment: Professional team, on time, great equipment. Highly recommend!

photographers.name: Moments by Neha
photographers.bio: Photography is my passion! I love natural light and candid moments. Based in Bangalore but happy to travel. Let's create some magic together!

reviews.name: Sneha
reviews.comment: Neha has such a good eye! She suggested some poses I never thought of. Really happy with the maternity shoot.

photographers.name: Snapshot Studio
photographers.bio: Small studio, big dreams! We offer affordable photography for families. Not the fanciest setup but we put our heart into every shot.

reviews.name: Vikram
reviews.comment: Good value for money. The studio is basic but they do good work. Happy with our family photos.

reviews.name: Lakshmi
reviews.comment: Photos were okay, but the studio could use some updating. Still, they were nice people to work with.
